description: Elementa Foods is an innovative company based in Greater Buenos Aires, specializing in the development of functional flours, particularly lupine flour, which is rich in protein and free from bitter residual taste. Founded by a group of former corporate professionals, Elementa aims to create sustainable, high-quality food products by integrating ancestral knowledge with modern agricultural practices. Their mission focuses on enhancing nutrition and adapting to contemporary lifestyles while fostering local partnerships and sustainability in the food industry.
name: Elementa Foods
